name: ce
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Common Era or Christian era: used when referring to a year after the birth of Jesus Christ when the Christian calendar starts counting years: The Scandinavian countries became Christian between 900 and 1100 CE. Compare
BCE
AD

Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Common Era, used for the period of time beginning with the year 1 of the calendar used today in many parts of the world, esp. in Europe and North and South America: The last Roman legions left Britain in 410 C.E.
C.E. is also an abbreviation forChristian era.
